data.text:
2022 Football Roster

Choose a Player:

1 Aaron Harris

Position Safety

Height 6-0

Weight 193

Class Senior

Hometown Aurora, Colo.

Prev School Northern Colorado

Bio

Related

Stats

Biography

Honors

Academic All-Big Sky (2018, 2019)

2022

Played in 10 games in his first season at MoState ... Made home debut count with 4 total tackles and 3 solos in win over UT Martin (9/8/22) ... Also had 4 stops vs. Southern Illinois (10/8/22) with 2 solo tackles ... Made MSU debut at Central Arkansas (9/1/22) with 3 tackles ... Brought down 3 bal carriers with a pass break-up in homecoming win over Western Illinois (10/29/22) ... Also notched 2 solo stops in game at North Dakota (10/1/22) ... Credited with a QB hurry and 2 tackles vs. No. 2 South Dakota St. (9/24/22) at home.

Northern Colorado

Played four seasons at Northern Colorado in Greeley ... 2021: Was 9th on the team in total tackles with 33, including 21 solos ... Also racked up 2.0 tackles for loss, 2 interceptions and 4 PBU's ... Both interceptions came in win over Houston Baptist (9/11/21), including a pick-six ... Had 7 tackles in win over Northern Arizona (9/25/21) with a tackle for loss ... 2020: UNC did not play any games during 2020-21 COVID year ... 2019: Played in all 12 games with 11 starts in the secondary ... Had the fourth-most tackles on the squad with 54, including 35 solo stops, 2 fumble recoveries and 2 PBU's with 1.5 tackles for loss and a sack ... Had 10 total tackles with 6 solos vs. Eastern Washington (10/12/19) ... Brought down 7 ball carriers with 5 solos vs. Sacramento State (9/14/19) ... Earned Academic All-Big Sky honors for second time ... 2018: As a freshman in 2018, he played in 8 games at nickle and cornerback, bringing down 12 ball carriers on the season, all solo stops with 1 PBU ... Tallied 7 tackles vs. UC Davis (10/6/18) ... Recovered a blocked punt for a touchdown against Northern Arizona (10/20/18) ... Earned Academic All-Big Sky honors.

High School

Was a standout for coach John Schultz at Grandview High in Aurora, Colo., where he lettered three seasons for the Wolves ... Earned 5A all-state honors as a senior ... Also lettered in basketball and track in high school.

Personal

Aaron Michael Harris was born 3/25/00 in Atlanta, Ga. ... Son of Michael and Denise Harris of Aurora, Colo. ... Has a brother, Isaac ... Pursuing MBA at Missouri State.
